During the build configuration step, you didn't define (leaving blank) any optimization flags you'd like to compile with which by default will set the ones available and enabled in your system:
`Please specify optimization flags to use during compilation when bazel option "--config=opt" is specified [Default is -march=native]: `

When compiling with bazel though you defined a set of optimization flags not previously configured in the previous step:
`Rakshiths-MacBook-Pro:tensorflow rakshithgb$ bazel build -c opt --copt=-mavx --copt=-mavx2 --copt=-mfma --copt=- msse4.1 --copt=-msse4.2 --config=opt -k //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`

You should have used `--config=opt` instead when compiling. 
If you want specific flags available in your system to be enabled in the build you need to specify in them in the configuration step.
